name: LionDEX
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: LION is the governance token of LionDEX with a limited supply of 1,000,000,000 tokens, 50% of which are rewarded to contributors through protocol growth incentives. LION has practical functions such as purchasing feeLP, participating in Launchpad and community governance. LION is also shared as protocol revenue through Earn.
